item1:
存貨储存单元基本数据的查询
Inquiry of basic data of inventory storage unit
item2:
可查询所有已下传的存貨储存单元基本数据
Query the basic data of all the inventory storage units that have been downloaded
item4:
SAP下传相关存貨储存单元基本数据
SAP downloads basic data of relevant inventory storage units
item5:
仓别代码、Article No
Warehouse No., Article No.
item6:
存貨储存单元基本数据
Inventory storage unit data
item7:
如果无符合条件的存貨储存单元数据，系统将提示查无存貨储存单元信息
If there is no eligible inventory storage unit data, the system will prompt to check that there is no such inventory storage unit information
item8:
1. 输入查询条件或挑选Article No后点选Query查询存貨储存单元基本数据
Enter query conditions or select Article No and click Query to query the basic data of the inventory storage unit
